TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EventTrackingEnabledAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Enables event tracking for a component. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
## Examples The following code example demonstrates the use of the EventTrackingEnabledAttribute type.
[!code-vb[EnterpriseServicesEventTrackingEnabledAttribute#0](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.enterpriseservi_10_1.vb)] [!code-cs[EnterpriseServicesEventTrackingEnabledAttribute#0](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.enterpriseservi_10_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, enabling event tracking.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The default constructor enables event tracking.
## Examples The following code example creates a new <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.EventTrackingEnabledAttribute>.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, optionally disabling event tracking.

remarks.format:

Docs.summary: Gets the value of the Value property, which indicates whether tracking is enabled.
Docs.value: if tracking is enabled; otherwise, . The default is .

remarks.format:
